text: The Thomas E. Hart House and Kalmia Gardens is a property in Hartsville, South Carolina, that was listed on the U.S. National Register of Historic Places in 1991. The house was built in 1817. ==References== South Carolina state historical marker for the Thomas E. Hart House Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in South Carolina Category:Houses completed in 1817 Category:Houses in Hartsville, South Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Darlington County, South Carolina Category:Historic districts on the National Register of Historic Places in South Carolina
title: Thomas E. Hart House
